shortdesc.ph: SDK preset voice beautifier options for voice chat.

plentry.pd: (0x00000000): Turns off the voice beautifier and uses the original voice.
(0x01010100): A more magnetic voice. Agora recommends using this for male voices. Otherwise, audio distortion may occur.
(0x01010200): A fresher voice. Agora recommends using this for female voices. Otherwise, audio distortion may occur.
(0x01010300): A more energetic voice. Agora recommends using this for female voices. Otherwise, audio distortion may occur.

(0x01020100): Singing beautifier effect. Calling setVoiceBeautifierPreset(SINGING_BEAUTIFIER) beautifies male voices and adds a small room reverb effect. Agora recommends using this for male voices. Otherwise, audio distortion may occur. Calling setVoiceBeautifierParameters(SINGING_BEAUTIFIER, param1, param2) beautifies both male and female voices and adds a reverb effect.

(0x01040100): Ultra high-quality effect that makes the audio clearer and restores more details. To achieve better audio quality, Agora recommends setting the profile in setAudioProfile(AUDIO_PROFILE_TYPE profile) to AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY (4) or AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY_STEREO (5), and setting scenario to AUDIO_SCENARIO_GAME_STREAMING (3) before calling . If your audio capture device already supports high-fidelity audio, it is recommended not to enable ultra high-quality voice. Otherwise, the SDK may over-enhance audio details, resulting in unexpected sound effects.
